legend_0110_hakase_01a:
I am currently at the deepest point of Area Zero,
in the Great Crater of Paldea.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_01b:
I am currently at the deepest point of Area Zero,
in the Great Crater of Paldea.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_02a:
I have been researching the unique Pokémon
here for a very long time.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_02b:
I have been researching the unique Pokémon
here for a very long time.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_03a:
I’m asking the two of you to lend a hand—
to help carry out the final step of the great\r
Professor Sada’s glorious research.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_03b:
I’m asking the two of you to lend a hand—
to help carry out the final step of the great\r
Professor Turo’s glorious research.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_04a:
But there is something we need first. Something
that can be found within that lab.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_04b:
But there is something we need first. Something
that can be found within that lab.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_05a: What we need...is the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Scarlet Book[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_05b: What we need...is the [VAR COLOR(0006)]Violet Book[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_06a: Ah. So you took it from the lab, did you, Arven?[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_06b: Ah. So you took it from the lab, did you, Arven?[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_08a:
Bring the Scarlet Book to the deepest depths of
Area Zero.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_08b:
Bring the Violet Book to the deepest depths of
Area Zero.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_09a:
I promise that it will be an experience worth
treasuring if you come.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_09b:
I promise that it will be an experience worth
treasuring if you come.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_10a:
I must note, however, that Area Zero is both
home to vicious Pokémon and outfitted with\r
powerful cybernetic security systems.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_10b:
I must note, however, that Area Zero is both
home to vicious Pokémon and outfitted with\r
powerful cybernetic security systems.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_11a:
It seems to me that you might struggle if the two
of you were to enter alone.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_11b:
It seems to me that you might struggle if the two
of you were to enter alone.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_12a:
You may take the time to gather some reliable
allies before you come, if you feel the need.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_12b:
You may take the time to gather some reliable
allies before you come, if you feel the need.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_hakase_13a:
I will be awaiting you in the deepest part of
Area Zero, whenever you arrive.[VAR 0114(000B)]
legend_0110_hakase_13b:
I will be awaiting you in the deepest part of
Area Zero, whenever you arrive.[VAR 0114(000E)]
legend_0110_friend_06:
It was down in Area Zero that Mabosstiff got
wounded in the first place...\c
Down in the Great Crater of Paldea.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0110_friend_07:
In all honesty, I’d be perfectly happy to never
see that place again...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0110_select_01: Of course I’m going to go!
legend_0110_friend_07b:
Our treasure, huh... Yeah, I suppose that WAS the
assignment we were given.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0110_friend_09:
And I can’t just stand by and watch while a friend
heads off into danger on h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser own.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0110_friend_10: So I guess I’m going, too![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0110_friend_10a: ’Sides, I’d love to give Mom a piece of my mind.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0110_friend_10b: ’Sides, I’d love to give Dad a piece of my mind.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0110_friend_12:
We’re gonna have a Pokémon battle to see if
we’re really ready to head into Area Zero or not![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0110_friend_13: Mostly to see if I’m ready or not! Let’s go![VAR 0114(0006)]
